sentence.Network_en: The querulous old man refused to be put on the shelf.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个爱抱怨的老人不肯让人撇在一边.

sentence.Network_en: A querulous male voice said, "Look, are you going to order, or what?"
sentence.Network_cn: 一个男人不满地问：“喂，你到底要不要点菜？”

sentence.Network_en: He was not one who was inclined to be querulous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他并不是爱吹毛求疵的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: quer=complain （ 抱怨）querulous 抱怨的quarrel 争吵
quern 手推磨querulous 发牢骚的querulously 抱怨地
tint:suffuse:damp:quenchquerulous adj. 抱怨的，多牢骚的habitually complaining
stripling年轻人，小伙子querulous爱发牢骚的，抱怨的blackbird黑鸟，乌鸦

list.abs: when Tereza's mother realized that her aggressiveness no longer had any power over her daughter , she started writing her querulous letters …特丽莎的母亲意识到自己的专横对女儿不再起作用时，便开始给她写一些发牢骚的信…
querulous 抱怨的querulous delusion 抱怨妄想query 质问
...型人格(fanatic personality)，诡辩型人格(querulant personality)，这类人表现固执，敏感多疑，过分警觉，心胸狭隘，好嫉妒;自我评 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from late Latin querulosus, from Latin querulus, from queri 'complain'

entry.def: Someone who is querulous often complains about things.

example.ex: A querulous male voice said, 'Look, are you going to order, or what?'
example.tran: 一个男人不满地问：“喂，你到底要不要点菜？”

auth_sentence.content: Sick people can be querulous and difficult.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sick people can be querulous and difficult.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sick people can be querulous and difficult.

auth_sentence.content: If I am ill and in pain I shall die in querulous misery.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I am ill and in pain I shall die in querulous misery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I am ill and in pain I shall die in querulous misery.

auth_sentence.content: Querulous quibbling quarks quickly quintupled quantum questions!
auth_sentence.res_content: Querulous quibbling quarks quickly quintupled quantum questions!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Querulous quibbling quarks quickly quintupled quantum questions!
